contentfulProduct.title: Lightweight Premium Down Alternative Comforter
contentfulProduct.subtitle: Traditional retail price $209

content.value:
Stuffed with hypoallergenic microfiber that mimics the loft and insulation of luxury down, this lightweight down alernative comforter is perfect for the allergy prone. The loops on every corner will keep it in place and the baffle box construction will keep it fluffy and evenly distributed. Perfect for summer months and warm climates.
Selected by SleepFoundation.org for "Best Duvet Inserts of 2021" and "Best Comforters of 2021".
Hypo-allergenic microfiber fill
100% cotton sateen shell
Mimics the loft and insulation of luxury goose down for the allergy prone
Baffle box construction - perfect for year round comfort - keeps the down alternative comforter lofty and the fill evenly distributed
Corner loops to tie duvet and keep cover in place
Made in the USA of imported materials
Machine wash in cold water, gentle cycle. Use mild detergents only. Tumble dry on lowest heat setting until completely dry. Option to professionally dry clean.

productDetails.productDetails:
